content.html: Important to know the vulnerability hype train is in full force for Log4j at the moment. A reminder that log4j is maintained by a small group of volunteers, up against multi billion dollar security industry and news media that profit from rewriting what they say to sound scary.
content.value:
Important to know the vulnerability hype train is in full force for Log4j at the moment. 

A reminder that log4j is maintained by a small group of volunteers, up against multi billion dollar security industry and news media that profit from rewriting what they say to sound scary.
